title: Stock Futures, Oil Prices Fall on Omicron Curbs
sub_head: Investors worry that measures to contain Covid-19 variant will weigh on growth and prolong elevated inflation
body:
U.S. stock futures, oil prices and bond yields fell as investors worried that a rise in Omicron Covid-19 cases would stall economic growth and add pressure to inflation.
Futures for the S&P 500 tumbled 1.3% Monday. The index fell Friday, notching its largest weekly percentage decline in three weeks. Contracts for the tech-focused Nasdaq-100 shed 1.5% Monday, and futures for the Dow Jones Industrial Average declined 1.3%.
